text:
Hi <@U02DARBD76C>
I am not from Fiverr, but maybe I can help.
I work at Content Beta, a video production studio and we’ve helped ManyChat, Leadfeeder and 70 other B2B companies create engaging product marketing and explainer videos to successfully raise awareness, increase your lead-to-customer ratio, generate more MQLs and signups.

Advantages of working with us are that we really understand B2B, we’re full service from script to storyboard to video editing to final video at a reasonable cost, we’re low touch, therefore, no spending hours on zoom calls explaining to us how your product works and we deliver fast (max 8-10 business days).

However, we only understand B2B and don’t do character animated explainer videos that all look the same.

You can check out examples of our work to see if you are a good fit for you:
<https://www.contentbeta.com/product-marketing-video/>
<https://www.contentbeta.com/video-examples/>

attachments.fallback: Content Beta: Product Explainer Video - Media Production Agency for Software
attachments.text: Communicate through professional marketing videos that showcase your value proposition quickly.
attachments.title: Product Explainer Video - Media Production Agency for Software

attachments.fallback: Content Beta: Video Examples | Video Production Service for SaaS & Software Business
attachments.text: Frictionless Product Marketing and Customer Training Video to get more demo requests and faster onboarding.
attachments.title: Video Examples | Video Production Service for SaaS & Software Business
